attributes.action: Commence gradual removal of lockdown immediately.
attributes.additional_details: The country has been in lockdown now for 5 weeks. The economy and the mental health of the population is being severely damaged. There is evidence that some businesses are already making their own plans to restart and if the government does not provide a plan to remove the lockdown it is  very likely that people will start to take the matter into their own hands and the lockdown will disintegrate in chaos.
attributes.background: I would like the government to provide a detailed plan of how we are going to remove the lockdown with the aim of commencing the gradual removal immediately.
